snippet: Prosecutors, working independently of politicians, are pursuing corruption cases against a widening pool of current and former officials and members of the business elite.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors, working independently of politicians, are pursuing corruption cases against a widening pool of current and former officials and members of the business elite.

headline.main: In Greece, Elites Are Starting to Feel the Pain
headline.print_headline: In Greece, Elites Are Starting To to Feel the Pain
